data.summary: Revisionist minimal pivot for step 11 RUN readiness failure.
data.root_cause_hypothesis: Replay comparator drift-classification precedence likely regressed, causing strict-order reorder drift to classify as flow_protocol instead of tool_sequence; this also suppresses or misroutes explainability grouping/rollup aggregation, producing explainability_rollup count 0 instead of expected 1 in mixed drift checks.
data.strategy: No scope expansion, no new dependencies, no broad refactor. Converted step 11 from blocked to pending and retargeted to Executor with explicit file scope and deterministic fix targets, then rerun replay-focused tests.

fix_targets.goal: Restore strict-order reorder classification precedence to tool_sequence over flow_protocol and preserve additive contracts.
Ensure assertions align to intended comparator output; verify explainability_rollup mixed-drift count remains expected=1.
